K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:173b-1: a'arya sidha n'a di ka na n'a ma mah'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:173b-3: 'phags pa seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:173b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:173b-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:173b-7: bcom ldan 'das nyi zla'i gnas rnam par rgyal byed kyi khang bzang gi nang na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:173b-8: dgra bcom pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:173b-9: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:173b-10: rnam par rgyal pa'i phung po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:174a-0: khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logs na gangg'a'i klung drug cu'i bye @174a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:174a-1: ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:174a-2: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos 'phags zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:174a-3: 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:174a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa de la blta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:174a-7: mchod pa bya ba'i phyir song zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:174a-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po 'jig rten gyi khams der stong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:174a-9: bcom ldan 'das chos 'phags de'i zhabs la phyag btsal te lan bdun bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:174a-10: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:174a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'phags des byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:174a-14: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de la cang mi smra bar kha rog 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:174a-15: de'i tshe der 'khor 'dus pha gang lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:174b-0: mi ma yin pa de dag 'di snyam du @174b sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:174b-1: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po 'di 'jig rten gsum gyi bla mas bka' stsal pa la lan mi gsol bar kha rog 'dug zhig gu snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:174b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis der seng ge bsgyings pa lta bus phyogs bcur gzigs nas 'khor thams cad the tshom du gyur pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:174b-3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'phags de 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i 'od kyi snang ba gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od gser brgya stong phrag du mas phyogs bcu snang bar mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:174b-4: de nas skad cig de nyid la sa chen po g-yos par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:174b-5: phyogs bcu nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:174b-7: tshul du ma 'chang ba dag bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul chen po de mthong nas 'jig rten gyi khams der thams cad 'dus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:174b-8: bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas rang rang gi dge bas bsgrubs pas 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:174b-9: pus mo g-yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:174b-10: ngo mtshar du gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:174b-11: rmad du gyur pas 'dzum dmul nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:174b-13: bdag cag gis 'od zer gyi cho 'phrul du ma dag mthong lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175a-1: gyi snang ba 'di lta bu dag sngon nam yang ma mthong lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175a-3: 'di'i don de ni legs pa lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175a-4: gang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa de lta bu mdzad pa'i don de bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te lung bstan du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175a-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od phreng gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175a-6: rnam 'dren gang zag mchog ste thugs rje can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175a-7: rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175a-8: bdag dang 'jig rten snang mdzad thugs rje can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175a-9: 'dzum mdzad rgyu dang mdzad rgyu nges par gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'phags dzambu chu bo'i gser ltar snang zhing 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma rab tu 'gyed pa; sku'i gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175a-11: mdog gzi brjid kyi sa 'bar ba de la byang chub sems dpa' 'od phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175a-13: bdag gis cho 'phrul mang po mthong lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175a-14: bdag gis sngon 'od zer gyi snang ba 'di lta bu nam yang ma mthong lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa des bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175a-17: phyogs 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi snang ba 'di lta bu chung du zhig mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175a-18: mtshan ma snang ba de dag ni rgyu med pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175a-19: byed rgyu med pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175b-0: khyod de'i phyir @175b legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175b-2: don gang gi phyir ngas 'dzum pa mdzad pa thos nas kyang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis skrag par mi bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175b-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul ni bsam gyi mi khyab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175b-9: smon lam ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175b-10: rnam par 'phrul ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175b-11: don de dag yang dag par mthong nas the tshom ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175b-13: gang 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas nga'i drung du byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po btang ba 'di khyod kyis mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175b-20: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po 'di langs khyod ga las 'ongs zhes de skad dris na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175b-21: de cang mi smra bar kha rog 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175b-23: ngas don gyi dbang 'di mthong nas 'dir 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175b-24: de bzhin gshegs pas smras pa'i lan de ci'i phyir 'dis ma gsol snyam du 'khor 'di dag thams cad the tshom du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175b-26: ngas smras pa'i lan skyes bu dam pa 'dis ci'i phyir ma gsol ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:175b-28: 'gro ba med pa'i chos rnams la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176a-1: bdag la khyod ga las 'ongs zhes 'ong ba rmed par mdzad do snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176a-2: chos thams cad brjod du ma mchis par yang glo bar chud na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176a-3: bcom ldan 'das ga las 'ongs zhes byung ba'i gnas la bdag gis gsol ba spro ba ma mchis so snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176a-5: mdor na rigs kyi bu 'dis chos thams cad bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176a-6: yang dag pa'i chos ston pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176a-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po yi ge med pa'i chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176a-11: yi ge dang bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176a-13: mtshan ma dang bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176a-15: blang ba dang bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176a-21: rnam par shes pa dang bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176a-22: rgyu rkyen dang bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176a-24: rnam par rig pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176a-26: ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176a-27: tshig gis brjod du med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176a-31: yang dag pa ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176a-32: bsags pa med pa'i gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176a-34: gdul ba med pa rnams la su zhig ston snyam du shes nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176a-36: bstan pa med pa 'dir bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' @176b lus 'od gsal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176b-2: gal te chos thams cad bstan du ma mchis pa lags na chos de dag thams cad lkugs pas bstan par 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176b-5: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176b-6: lkugs pa 'ba' zhig gis ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176b-7: sems can thams cad kyang mi shes bzhin du chos ston par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176b-10: ji ltar sems can thams cad ma 'tshal bzhin du chos ston pa de bshad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176b-13: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lus 'od gsal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176b-17: dbus long dag nyi ma shar kyang gzugs mthong bar mi 'gyur zhing nyi ma'i 'od ci 'dra ba'ang mi shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176b-18: ji ltar gzhan dag gis nyi ma'i mtshan nyid 'di lta bu zhig yin no zhes bstan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176b-19: de ltar gzhan gyi sgra las nyi ma yin par mngon par zhen to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176b-21: de bzhin du chos thams cad nang du 'dus shing dbyings kyi nang du 'dus te; dbyings med cing yi ge med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:176b-23: chos thams cad brjod du med pa yin na rkyen gyi dbang gis sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:177a-2: sgra la brten nas brag ca'i sgra 'byung yang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:177a-4: ri brag gi sgra ni stong pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:177a-6: de bzhin du rkyen la brten nas yi ge'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:177a-7: yi ge'i sgra ni stong pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:177a-9: sems can gang dag brjod pa de thams cad so so yang dag par rig pa'i nang du 'dus par blta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:177a-10: tshig gis brjod pa gang yin pa de ni chos so sor yang dag par rig pa yin par blta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:177a-11: tshig gis brjod pa gang yin pa de ni don so so yang dag par rig pa yin par blta bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:177a-12: de lta bas na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems can gyi gang cung zad g-yo ba de thams cad chos kyi sdom bzhir 'dus par blta bar bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:177a-13: 'byung po dag mi shes pas gnas mi g-yo'o /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:177a-14: de ltar mi dmus long de'i ltar shes pa de bzhin du chos de nyid la mngon par zhen to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:177a-16: don yongs su 'tshol bar 'dod pas rang gi rgyud las yongs su btsal bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:177a-18: byang chub yongs su 'tshol bar 'dod pas rang gi nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga las btsal bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:177a-19: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i don ji lta ba bzhin bshad pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:177a-20: snang ba chen pos 'jig rten khyab par shin tu snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:177b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'phags kyi ljags kyi dbang po phyung nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ljags kyi dbang pos yang dag par bkab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:177b-2: ljags kyi dbang po de las 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:177b-3: 'od zer de dag gis sems can dmyal ba chen po la sogs pa nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:177b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ljags kyi dbang po de nyid slar bsdus nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:177b-6: lce 'di lta bu yod pa ni rdzun mi zer te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:177b-8: ngas gtam cung zad ji lta ba bzhin bshad pa de ltar brtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:177b-11: de nas sa bcu la gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:177b-18: lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:177b-20: mi ma yin pa'i 'khor thams cad stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:177b-22: yang dag pa'i don bstan pa bshad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:177b-25: sangs rgyas kyi mthus som nyi mi bgyi zhing the tshom mi bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor @178a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178a-1: la lan gnyis lan gsum du gzigs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178a-3: skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178a-4: skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir seng ge'i sgras bshad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178a-6: gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178a-7: 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178a-9: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'phags pa nyid yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178a-10: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams la chos ston pa mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178a-11: de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ngo mtshar du gyur cing rmad du gyur pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178a-13: de ltar sems can thams cad la seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa legs lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178a-16: ji ltar 'khor 'dir seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i sgra 'di thos par 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang yid ches par 'gyur ba'i sems can gang lags pa de dag kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178a-18: dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags na gang 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178b-0: gzhan dag @178b la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178b-1: mdo sde 'di la me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178b-9: ba dan dag gis mchod pa bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178b-10: seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa'i mdo sde 'di sems can gang gi rna bar thos par 'gyur ba de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178b-12: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178b-15: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178b-18: gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra 'di thos nas rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis legs so zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig rjes su 'bul na'ang rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178b-19: rigs kyi bu mo de dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178b-20: de dag ngas yongs su bzung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178b-21: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas kyang mgron du gnyer bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178b-22: de dag gis nga yi byang chub phrag pa la khyer ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178b-23: gang snyigs ma lnga dag la bab pa'i tshe mdo sde 'di la mos pa'i sems can de dag ni ngas yongs su smin par byas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178b-24: tshe rabs gzhan du'ang mi pham pas yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:178b-25: de'i skye ba'i rgya mtsho bskams pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:179a-2: nyon mongs pa rnams bsal pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:179a-3: chos kyi rnga shin tu brdungs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:179a-4: srid pa gsum rnam par bzlog pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:179a-5: phyir rgol ba rnams las nges par rgyal ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:179a-6: nyon mongs pa rnams bsal ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:179a-8: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:179a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'di thos nas dad par mi byed na de nyes pa che ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:179a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:179a-11: de de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gror bya bas rim gror byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:179a-13: rigs kyi bu mo gang gzhan zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par bstan pa 'di thos nas dad cing sems rab tu dang bas legs so zhes bya ba 'bul na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:179a-14: gang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byas pa de bas 'di bsod nams ches lhag par brgya phrag stong gsog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:179a-15: de lta bas na rigs kyi bu gang dag nga la skyabs su song ba de dag gis mdo sde 'di bri bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:179b-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par @179b rgyal ba'i phung po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:179b-3: spyan rnam par dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:179b-6: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:179b-10: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:179b-13: de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:179b-15: slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe snyigs ma lnga la bab pa na bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di rgyas par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:179b-17: gang mdo sde 'di la mos pa'i sems can de ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das par rig par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:179b-19: sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyi rna bar mdo sde 'di thos par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:179b-20: gang dag rgya cher 'jug pa de dag gi yon tan gyi mtha' ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du rtogs par dka' ba lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:179b-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:179b-25: de ltar khyed rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gdos pa 'dzin pa lta bur gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:179b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:180a-1: dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:180a-2: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:180a-5: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:180a-6: 'phags pa seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:180a-7: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bidy'a ka ra singha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-009:180a-8: lo ts'a ba bande pa rje ye shes snying pos bsgyur nas gtan la phab pa //
